name: Facebook News Feed Filter for Apps
description:
This is a filter based off of style 26819 by user 911. It is the same code, but for for other games that she does not have in the style. I will remove it if you wish, user 911. If you don't want me to, cool. If anyone has any requests for me to add to this, let me know and I will add other apps.

Changes (July 4, 2010):
* Added Treasure Isle and fixed a bad url in the Mafia Wars Feed.

Apps in this extension:
* Mafia Wars - http://www.facebook.com/home.php?filter=app_10979261223
* Treasure Isle - http://www.facebook.com/?filter=app_234860566661

Contact me on Facebook and add me as your friend!
http://www.facebook.com/justinmiller87

Donations:
Any donations sent to me through PayPal go to the Justin & Lindsey Miller "Bring Anna Home" Fund. Anna is the girl we're adopting from Russia. If you would like to use it as a tax deduction, you can instead mail a check to:

A Child's Embrace
Attn: Anna 81020
2012 Broadway Street
Vancouver, WA, 98663
